PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-03152025-03-07AAFC, FIN
ActAgricultural Marketing Programs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Agricultural Marketing Programs Regulations (2025)
PrecisRegulations Amending the AGRICULTURAL MARKETING PROGRAMS REGULATIONS (2025) in order to temporarily increase the interest-free loan limit under the Advance Payments Program to $250,000 for all eligible agricultural producers for the 2025 program year.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0090 Publication Date: 2025-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the AGRICULTURAL MARKETING PROGRAMS REGULATIONS (2025) in order to temporarily increase the interest-free loan limit under the Advance Payments Program to $250,000 for all eligible agricultural producers for the 2025 program year.
